name: Ao Zora to Nakama Tachi Yume no Bouken
name_original: Ao Zora to Nakama Tachi Yume no Bouken
description: Ao Zora To Nakama Tachi - Yume No Bouken is a platform game that was released in Gameboy Advance and Playstation One consoles in 2003. The game features Ao Zora that is a blue elephant that transport in his back a friend animal in a plataform game with a boss stage at the end of the level that can be defeated after a riddle contest.
